Package org.sibermatica.math

package org.sibermatica.math
Alternative to Math and StrictMath.
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    Addition<T>
    Addition.
    Multiplication<T>
    Multiplication.
    NativeOperators<T>
    Operators that can be implemented in a more performant way using the language constructs.
    Precision.DoubleEquivalence
    Interface containing comparison operations for doubles that allow values to be considered equal even if they are not exactly equal.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    AccurateMath
    Portable alternative to Math and StrictMath.
    ArithmeticUtils
    Some useful, arithmetics related, additions to the built-in functions in Math.
    ByteDecimal
    ByteDecimal
    JdkMath
    Wrapper for alternative implementations of Math functions.

    Math
    Numbers

    Precision
    Utilities for comparing numbers.
    Sum
    Class providing accurate floating-point sums and linear combinations.
